page.title: 03A DAY IN MY LIFE BY JEAN
page.content: Every Saturday I go into Dewsbury with my friend Dawn.We take our money and some times buy earrings and beads.The one thing we always buy is a "WHAM" badge, book and poster."WHAM" is my favourite pop group.When we've spent up we look around the town.My Mum buys my clothes.She goes to Dewsbury and buys what I like.I like to wear jeans, a sweater and a pair of trainers at the weekend.If it is warm I wear some shorts and a top.After my dinner I slouch down in the chair and watch television.We have two pets in our house; one is a dog and the other is a budgie.Before I go out in the morning I do my jobs- make my bed, wash up and tidy the breakfast bar, then look after my sister Collette.In my spare time I do some drawing and read Enid Blyton books.On Saturdays we do gym in my back garden.
